title: Issa, Hunter have issues with Trump travel ban
text: The policy meant that people from those countries who planned to come to the United States, including refugees who had completed a lengthy background check and security vetting process, were abruptly denied entry. In some cases people were detained at airports or returned to their country of origin, while other people who had come to the U.S. but had made a brief visit to their home country found that they could not return.
summary:
The policy meant that people from those countries who planned to come to the United States, including refugees who had completed a lengthy background check and security vetting process, were abruptly denied entry.
In some cases people were detained at airports or returned to their country of origin, while other people who had come to the U.S. but had made a brief visit to their home country found that they could not return.
